posts.post_title: FS: SGC 40 T206 Johnson & Lajoie portraits
posts.post_content:
Posted By: steve yawitz
In addition to those nice Hall of Fame portraits, I have a few other items available right now - everything from an out-of-register T206 Shipke (graded by GAI, no less) to a crisp E93 Wagner. It certainly wouldn't pain me to hold onto these, but it also wouldn't pain my bottom line, which is being traumatized by some major home improvements, to let a few go. Anyway, prices and pics are available here: [url]http://imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/gradedbaseball[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
